includedAssets.title: The Karate Kid (1984)
includedAssets.synopsis: Ralph Macchio stars as a bullied teenager who polishes up his martials arts skills and takes on a motorcylce gang after karate lessons from his building's janitor. The first and best of The Karate Kid series, the show is stolen by Noriyuki "Pat" Morita as the youngster's high kicking mentor. (The Karate Kid was originally one of DC Comics' Legion of Superheroes).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: New kid Daniel stands up to his bullies with the help of karate master Mr Miyagi in this family favourite. Starring Ralph Macchio and Pat Morita.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ralph Macchio stars as a bullied teenager who polishes up his martials arts skills and takes on a motorcylce gang after karate lessons from his building's janitor. The first and best of The Karate Kid series, the show is stolen by Noriyuki "Pat" Morita as the youngster's high kicking mentor. (The Karate Kid was originally one of DC Comics' Legion of Superheroes).

includedAssets.title: The Karate Kid Part II
includedAssets.synopsis: Karate kid Daniel (Ralph Macchio) and his mentor Mr Miyagi (Noriyuki 'Pat' Morita) travel to Japan to settle a 50-year-old duel of honour. Returning to his father's sick bed, Miyagi is forced to face up to an old love rival Sato... so a battle to the death is arranged by an embittered landowner. More high kicks and high jinks in this follow-up to the wildly successful original. Listen out for Peter Cetera's Oscar-winning Glory of Love song.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: High-kicking karate student Daniel and his mentor Mr Miyagi travel to Japan to settle an old score. Family action sequel with Ralph Macchio.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Karate kid Daniel (Ralph Macchio) and his mentor Mr Miyagi (Noriyuki 'Pat' Morita) travel to Japan to settle a 50-year-old duel of honour. Returning to his father's sick bed, Miyagi is forced to face up to an old love rival Sato... so a battle to the death is arranged by an embittered landowner. More high kicks and high jinks in this follow-up to the wildly successful original. Listen out for Peter Cetera's Oscar-winning Glory of Love song.

includedAssets.title: The Karate Kid III
includedAssets.synopsis: Humiliated high-kickin' villain Kreese (Martin Kove) returns to get his revenge against Miyagi (Noriyuki 'Pat' Morita) and Daniel (Ralph Macchio). Bankrupt and still smarting after that defeat, he's enlisted a nasty helping hand... but Daniel turns down the title challenge. More fast-paced martial arts and a winner for those who got off on the previous two instalments.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Hothead Daniel dumps Mr Miyagi for a new coach. But without his ally, can the youngster defeat the toxic waste baron who is training an old enemy?
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Humiliated high-kickin' villain Kreese (Martin Kove) returns to get his revenge against Miyagi (Noriyuki 'Pat' Morita) and Daniel (Ralph Macchio). Bankrupt and still smarting after that defeat, he's enlisted a nasty helping hand... but Daniel turns down the title challenge. More fast-paced martial arts and a winner for those who got off on the previous two instalments.

includedAssets.title: The Karate Kid (2010)
includedAssets.synopsis: Moving to China, young Jaden Smith is bullied by local kids, until martial arts master Jackie Chan teaches him to fight back. Family action remake.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Moving to China, young Jaden Smith is bullied by local kids, until martial arts master Jackie Chan teaches him to fight back. Family action remake.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Moving to China, young Jaden Smith is bullied by local kids, until martial arts master Jackie Chan teaches him to fight back. Family action remake.

includedAssets.title: The Karate Kid Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Ralph Macchio and Jaden Smith are the karate kicking kids using martial arts to battle their troubles in these family classics.
